limmen.controllers

Class GenreController

  • java.lang.Object
    • limmen.controllers.GenreController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin
 @RequestMapping(value="/resources/genres")
public class GenreController
extends java.lang.Object
    RestController for the resource pointed by the url: /resources/genres*
    Author:
    Kim Hammar on 2016-03-22.
